about_the_game:
Join Rissa and Diana in a quest to prevent a civil war from breaking out in Aereon, the brink of an empire in turmoil in Insurgence - Chains of Renegade. This engaging 2D RPG mixed with Visual Novel elements will keep you on the edge of your seat with its classic front view Turn Based combat, HD 2D Graphics, and over 10 hours of gameplay.

Take control of Rissa, a knight assigned by her father, the Empire's prime minister, to capture one of the opposition leaders to stop the impending war. But as Rissa delves deeper into her mission, she uncovers an unsettling truth that the Empire has been hiding. Will she fight for what is right, or will she choose to remain loyal to the Empire? The choice is yours in Insurgence - Chains of Renegade.



Experience a vast amount of usable skills, with each character boasting over 40+ Skills & Specials, 25+ Weapons, 25+ Armors, and 60+ Accessories that can be equipped to gain additional skills. With 4 choices of difficulty settings and a unique Skill Equip System, players can tailor their gameplay experience to their liking.

Engross yourself in the world of Insurgence - Chains of Renegade with its Visual Novel-styled dialogue, over 20 original CGs, and 20+ Collectible Artworks by Various Artists. Don't miss out on the opportunity to embark on an unforgettable adventure and discover the truth that lies within the empire.
